data.title: Fire at Srisailam hydroelectric plant in Telangana, 8 trapped
data.desc: A fire, followed by an explosion, was reported at an underground hydroelectric power station of the Srisailam project in Telangana. Rescue operations with at least eight people feared trapped.

data.title: Namaste goes global: Emmanuel Macronâ€™s Indian-style welcome to Angela Merkel goes viral
data.desc: In the latest addition to the list of world leaders ditching handshake, French President Emmanuel Macron welcomed Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel with namaste.

data.title: Suresh Raina will be synonymous with team spirit: PM Narendra Modi pens letter of appreciation for CSK star
data.desc: Chennai Super Kings star Suresh Raina took to social media to thank Prime Minister Narendra Modi for a warm letter of appreciation he received after retiring from international cricket.

data.title: Exclusive: Rhea Chakraborty and Mahesh Bhatt's WhatsApp chats from June 8, after she left Sushant's home
data.desc: India Today has exclusively sourced WhatsApp chats exchanged between Rhea Chakraborty and Mahesh Bhatt on June 8, after she left Sushant Singh Rajput's Bandra, Mumbai home.
